You actually can occasionally feel ovaries from the outside (need to have one hand in the vagina lifting the uterus up and the other hand feeling for the ovaries - requires some knowledge of anatomy and even then it's subtle, and usually used by OBGYN doctors to check for swelling from infection - they're easier to feel when they're swollen), but it definitely does not cause ovulation.

In this case, image is especially important... if a video like that got out and became something big, it could mean employers not wanting to hire you based on your public image, family members alienating you, etc... I know even in the US there have been instances where people got turned down for jobs just because they played online games, or had certain pictures, or music linked on social media. But also, this is a fictional story, obviously, it's gonna be exaggerated quite a bit for drama, and to bring sex into it since it's an H manga. Don't take it too seriously.

When I was in Japan a few years back I learnt that a girls "image" is fairly important for instance while going out to a club with some friends a bunch of girls stared at us since we were pretty much the only non-japanese ppl in the club. But none of them approached us, but they did a weird thing where it looked like their eyes were gonna pop out when they looked at us. We later learned that was an "invitation" to come and talk to them. Since if a girl comes up and talks to a guy first they are seen as sluts/whores so they eye popping is used to say "hey I am interested come here" the first few nights it just freaked us out instead.
